## UpdateQueue interface

A work queue used to synchronize writes to the DOM.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface UpdateQueue 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[enqueue(callable)](../fast-element.updatequeue.enqueue/)


</td><td>

Schedules DOM update work in the next batch.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[next()](../fast-element.updatequeue.next/)


</td><td>

Resolves with the next DOM update.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[process()](../fast-element.updatequeue.process/)


</td><td>

Immediately processes all work previously scheduled through enqueue.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setMode(isAsync)](../fast-element.updatequeue.setmode/)


</td><td>

Sets the update mode used by enqueue.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
